sentence.text: The classical mammalian isoforms of PLD are N-glycan processing and cell motility, and the levels of both mRNA were higher at the primary tumor sites than in normal kidney tissues.
Notably, shRNA-mediated knockdown of cell motility suppressed the growth and invasion of tumors in establishment of mitotic spindle orientation mouse xenograft models.
As for genes relating to the tumor invasion of cell motility, we found that angiogenin (angiogenesis) was positively regulated by PLD2.

In transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter, the expression levels of angiogenesis were elevated in tumor tissues as compared with normal kidney and the inhibition of ANG activity with a neutralizing antibody significantly suppressed tumor invasion.

entity.text: transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter
